frewpy.models.core.core_check_extension(file_path: str) → str¶

Checks whether the file extension is in the list of accepted file extensions.

file_pathstr

Absolute file path to the Frew model.

file_extensionstr

The file extension of the file path passed into the function.

frewpy.models.core.core_check_path(file_path: str) → bool¶

Checks the file path exists.

file_pathstr

Absolute file path to the Frew model.

bool

Returns True if the file path exists.

frewpy.models.core.core_clear_results(json_data: dict) → dict¶

Clears the results in the json file so that it can be analysed using the COM interface.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file without the results.

frewpy.models.core.core_get_file_history(json_data: dict) → list¶

Returns the file history of the Frew model.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.

file_historylist

The file history of the Frew model.

frewpy.models.core.core_get_file_version(json_data: dict) → str¶

Returns the file version of the Frew model.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.

file_versionlist

The file version of the Frew model.

frewpy.models.core.core_get_num_nodes(json_data: dict, num_stages: int) → int¶

Returns the number of nodes in the Frew model.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.

num_stagesint

The number of stages in the Frew model.

unique_num_nodesint

The number of nodes which are present in each stage. This will always just be 1 integer, and the function will raise an error if it is not the same for every stage.

frewpy.models.core.core_get_num_stages(json_data: dict) → int¶

Returns the number of stages in the model.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.

num_stagesint

The number of stages in the Frew model.

frewpy.models.core.core_get_stage_names(json_data: dict, num_stages: int) → list¶

Returns the names of the stages within the Frew model.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.

num_stagesint

The number of stages in the Frew model.

stage_nameslist

A list of the names of stages within the Frew model.

frewpy.models.core.core_get_titles(json_data: dict) → dict¶

Returns the titles within the json model.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.

titlesdict

A dictionary containing all the titles information for the model.

frewpy.models.core.core_load_data(file_path: str) → dict¶

Loads the json file in as a Python dictionary.

file_pathstr

Absolute file path to the Frew model.

json_datadict

A Python dictionary of the data held within the json model file.
